column2: We-Vibe Chorus Pro Remote & App-Controlled Couples Vibrator Satin Black
column16:
Turn intimacy up a notch. Chorus Pro is We-Vibe’s most powerful couples vibrator, crafted to deliver blended clitoral and G-spot stimulation while keeping you perfectly in sync. Slide it into place during sex, clip the remote into your palm, and feel the toy respond to you both - instantly, intuitively.

Fusion Wave Technology powers two synchronised clitoral motors in the outer arm to create rolling, wave-like pulses. It’s a deeper, more dynamic stimulation that feels wonderfully different to standard buzz. Inside, the curved arm targets the G-spot for that delicious, full-body build.

The Haptic Squeeze Remote makes control effortless: squeeze to increase intensity; loosen to soften it. The remote vibrates with the same strength as the toy, so you both feel the changes in real time. Prefer to play hands-free? Switch on Touch Sense Mode and let built-in motion sensors adapt vibrations to your movements. You can fine-tune sensitivity in the We-Vibe app, customise patterns, and play together from across the room, or across the world.

When you’re done, drop everything into the charging case. It stores and powers both the toy and the remote, keeping your Satin Black Chorus Pro discreet, tidy and always ready.
